pageContent: Objective: To describe treatments for localized prostate cancer: surgery, external radiation therapy, and brachytherapy; watchful waiting might also be appropriate. Patients trying to decide about treatment ask family physicians for advice. This article sets out a framework to aid patients (and physicians) in the decision.

metaData.source:
The prostate cancer journey: results of an online survey of men and their partners
